main event: A UFO sighting involving an object with flashing red, green, and orange lights was reported in Winnipeg, Manitoba, on 19 October 1955.
interesting points: The UFO was observed for 15 minutes by a civilian control tower operator., The object had flashing lights approximately the size of a matchhead., The lights included red, green, and orange which flashed sequentially., The UFO was moving fast in a northerly direction before disappearing over the horizon., Ground visual observations and binoculars were used during the sighting.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with flashing lights
witness description: civilian control tower operator and a civilian doctor
